title: Data Science Practical Competency Enhancement: Embodied Learning & Analogical Games for Early Numerical Representation Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic cognitive development theories and instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain game design principles for numerical expression development using embodied learning strategies.
Learners can develop at least two educational activity scenarios applying the spatial-numerical alignment principle.
Learners can design assessment tools that promote cognitive representation formation through analogy-based games.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
